description: Distance to the largest Catalan number which is less than, but divides the n-th Catalan number; i.e. a(n) gives minimum k (> 0) such that C_{n-k}|C_n.
maple: [seq(WCD(j),j=1..100)]; WCD := proc(n) local i; for i from n-1 by -1 to 0 do if(0 = (`mod`(Cat(n),Cat(i)))) then RETURN(n-i); fi; od; end; Cat := n -> (binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1));
mathematica: a[n_] := For[k = n - 1, True, k--, If[Divisible[CatalanNumber[n], CatalanNumber[k]], Return[n - k]]]; a[1] = 1; Array[a, 100] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 06 2016 *)
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 13 2001
